long_description: The Yakima Wavehog includes everything you need to get up to 3 boards to the beach and back! Includes a pair of lockable RipCord cargo straps (each 12 ft.) with SKS locks, lock cores and keys. 2 EVA aerodynamically molded SoulPads (each 16 in.) fit crossbars for cushioning against bumps. Also included is the S.U.P. Brah nose/tail tie-down strap system for added board stability on the highway. Buckles are rubber covered for vehicle and board protection. Yakima WaveHog fits round, square and most factory crossbars.
short_description: The Yakima Wavehog includes everything you need to get up to 3 boards to the beach and back!
